metadata.title: CVE-2014-9273 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
lib/handle.c in Hivex before 1.3.11 allows local users to execute arbitrarycode and gain privileges via a small hive files, which triggers anout-of-bounds read or write.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-9273` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libhivex-bin - 1.3.11-1
libhivex-ocaml - 1.3.11-1
libhivex0 - 1.3.11-1
libwin-hivex-perl - 1.3.11-1
python-hivex - 1.3.11-1
python3-hivex - 1.3.11-1
ruby-hivex - 1.3.11-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: hivex package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.3.11-1').
